name: Xpraize Beta for GameMaster
description:
Xpraize Beta for GameMaster, a game developed by RedefineArts, is an innovative game that allows TRPGs to be played in a virtual space.
The game is available in PC and VR versions, and in the PC version, you are the Game Master.
The Game Master follows the prepared TRPG scenario, switching stages, controlling NPC characters, and performing various event actions.
While reading the scenario, you can change the stage to a castle or sometimes control a dragon to hunt down players.

The scenarios currently distributed are online multiplayer for up to 5 players, with all players except the game master participating from VR.
We are now including a fantasy scenario called "Dragon Descendants".
We hope you will experience the fun of Xpraize through this scenario first.

Additional scenario updates will be regularly scheduled after the release and will be distributed as DLC.
